author: musm
body:
Note the unnecessary extra new line
```
PS /home/mus> gci


    Directory: /home/mus

Mode                LastWriteTime         Length Name
----                -------------         ------ ----
d-----           9/27/19  4:50 PM                bin
d-----          10/23/19  2:11 PM                julia
d-----           10/1/19  3:10 PM                julia-1.3.0-rc2

PS /home/mus>
```

Expected

```
PS /home/mus> gci

    Directory: /home/mus

Mode                LastWriteTime         Length Name
----                -------------         ------ ----
d-----           9/27/19  4:50 PM                bin
d-----          10/23/19  2:11 PM                julia
d-----           10/1/19  3:10 PM                julia-1.3.0-rc2

PS /home/mus>
```
title: Feature Request: Remove extra newline at the start of
